meanings.definition: A regulation requiring people to remain indoors between specified hours, typically at night.
meanings.sent1: During the curfew, everyone must stay inside their homes.
meanings.sent2: The city announced a curfew starting at 10 PM.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the curfew was a great excuse to nap all night.
meanings.sent4: The darkness outside imposed a silent curfew on the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The curfew made the streets eerily quiet and deserted.

meanings.definition: The time designated as the start of a curfew.
meanings.sent1: The curfew began at midnight, signaling the time to go home.
meanings.sent2: As soon as the curfew hit, the streets emptied out.
meanings.sent3: The curfew time felt like a magical spell cast over the town.
meanings.sent4: The curfew hour descended like a curtain of safety.
meanings.sent5: The curfew hour chimed like a clock striking midnight.

meanings.sent1: The mayor decided to curfew the entire city due to safety concerns.
meanings.sent2: Parents curfewed their children after dark to ensure they were safe.
meanings.sent3: The idea to curfew the park after sunset seemed like a good idea.
meanings.sent4: The storm curfewed the outdoor activities for the day.
meanings.sent5: The decision to curfew the area was met with mixed reactions.
